pullRequest.title: Move deprecation HTTP tests to deprecation plugin
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR moves the deprecation HTTP tests under the deprecation plugin, as a precursor to adding further tests as part of #58924. Thanks to @jakelandis for help with the implementation.

commit.message: Move deprecation HTTP tests to deprecation plugin

nodes.bodyText: This should probably be moved to org.elasticsearch.xpack.deprecation?

nodes.bodyText: Why is this necessary? I don't see it in the qa/smoke-test-http project these tests lived in before?
